column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Service was very friendly. We had a nice waiter
column2: whom we actually confused with all the others...I mean
column3: they were all wearing plaid shirts
column4: and all the male waiters were Asian...why do they all have to wear plaid?! Lol. Anyway
column5: the service was great from all the waiters who helped us out!
